industry: Transportation, Logistics, Supply Chain and Storage, Warehousing and Storage, and Wholesale Import and Export
description:
Job Title: Warehouse Inventory Coordinator for St. Nicks Christmas Lighting and Decor

Company: St. Nicks Christmas Lighting and Decor

Location: 6861 Walker St, La Palma, CA

About Us

St. Nicks Christmas Lighting and Decor has been a leader in creating beautiful holiday decor for over 20 years. We specialize in the installation of commercial holiday lighting and decorations for local cities, commercial office buildings, retail shopping centers, airports, casinos, and more.

Position Overview

We are seeking a detail-oriented, skilled Warehouse Inventory Coordinator to manage our inventory for the 2024-25 holiday season. If you excel at developing spreadsheets, navigating inventory databases, exporting and importing data accurately, and leading teams in manual hand counts, we want to meet you. This computer-based role involves overseeing inventory levels, ensuring efficient warehouse operations, and managing data for inventory exports. You will supervise a small team to maintain accurate data entry and inventory control, perfect the existing inventory count, and develop a structure for receiving and inputting new decor. Join our team at St. Nicks Christmas Lighting and Decor in La Palma, CA, and help us continue our tradition of creating stunning holiday decor.

Key Responsibilities

  • Develop and implement an inventory tracking system to ensure accurate and efficient inventory management.
  • Maintain accurate inventory records, tracking all incoming and outgoing items.
  • Enhance the use of Zoho Inventory for tracking and managing inventory processes.
  • Conduct regular inventory audits to ensure accuracy and completeness.
  • Organize and maintain the warehouse layout for optimal efficiency and safety.
  • Track inventory and generate reports.
  • Communicate best practices for inventory counts to the team.
  • Manage incoming shipments and their effects on existing inventory.
  • Coordinate the receipt, storage, and distribution of holiday decor items and materials.
  • Communicate with suppliers, delivery drivers, and installation teams to coordinate logistics.
  • Prepare and manage shipping and receiving documentation.
  • Monitor and order necessary supplies and materials.
  • Implement and enforce safety procedures and protocols within the warehouse.
  • Assist with loading and unloading trucks as needed.

Qualifications

  • Must be 18 years or older.
  • Proficient in Excel and inventory database management.
  • Zoho Inventory experience a plus
  • Proven experience in warehouse operations, inventory management, or a related field.
  • Strong organizational and time management skills.
  • Ability to lift and move items up to 50 lbs.
  • Familiarity with warehouse management software and inventory tracking systems.
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
  • Reliable transportation and a valid driver’s license are required.
  • Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
  • Attention to detail and accuracy in record-keeping.
  • Forklift certification is a plus.
  • Bilingual skills are a plus.

Benefits

Competitive pay based on experience.

Opportunities for overtime during peak seasons.

Training provided for all aspects of the job.

Positive and supportive work environment.

Work Schedule

Flexible hours with the potential for night and weekend work during peak periods.

Hours range from 20-40+ per week as the season progresses until mid-January.

Potential for additional opportunities post-season for those with hustle.

Employment Type: Temp/Seasonal

Years Experience: 1 - 3 years

Salary: $20 - $23 Hourly

Bonus/Commission: No
